sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 10 cm and a height of 8 cm. Find its area.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, we use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 10 cm and the height is 8 cm. So, we plug these values into the formula:

Area = 10 cm × 8 cm = 80 cm²

The area of the parallelogram is 80 square centimeters.
